survey.description: CYCLING and MOUNTAIN BIKING SURVEY QUESTIONNAIRE

intro.name: INTRODUCTION
intro.label: Good Morning/Afternoon my name is _____ from Scott Porter Research, an independent market research company. We are undertaking a project about cycling and mountain biking in the UK and would like your help in a survey we are conducting. It will take about 15 minutes of your time.

single.name: QA
single.label: Who in your household is primarily responsible for making the decision about the short breaks and holidays taken?

single.name: QB
single.label: Have you taken a holiday or short break in the UK in the last 2 years?

single.name: QC
single.label: Thinking now about cycling/mountain biking, do you ever cycle?

single.name: QD
single.label: Was cycling or mountain biking an activity that was undertaken as part of the short break(s) or holiday(s) you took in the UK in the last 2 years?

single.name: QE
single.label: Where in the UK did you go for the most recent short break/holiday which involved a cycling or mountain biking activity?

single.name: QF
single.label: Would you seriously consider a short break or holiday in Scotland in the next 12 months which incorporated (some) cycling (e.g half/full day outing, a cycling excursion, or as the main activity)?

single.name: QG
single.label: Thinking about cycling/mountain biking whilst on a holiday or short break in the UK, which of the following statements best reflects your own behaviour or attitude?

close.label: I have been on/would consider a holiday or break that is based around cycling i.e. the main focus of the whole holiday/break...
I have been on/would consider a holiday or break where cycling is part of the holiday/break, but wouldn't be the whole or main focus of it...

multiple.name: Q1
multiple.label: What kind of bike(s) do you personally own?

single.name: Q2a
single.label: How many bikes do you personally have?

single.name: Q2b
single.label: And how many bikes are there in your household?

multiple.name: Q3
multiple.label: Who do you usually cycle when you're not on holidays?

single.name: Q4
single.label: And on average how often do you go for a bike ride/cycle when not on holiday?

multiple.name: Q5
multiple.label: Which of the following types of route/path do you usually use?

single.name: Q6
single.label: How would you rate your own cycling ability?

grid.name: Q7a
grid.label: I am going to read out a number of statements. Could you please tell me which one or two best describe your attitude to cycling/biking, especially when away from home? If you select two statements, please could you tell me which one is the most important aspect for you personally.

close.label: Having a laugh and a challenge with my pals
Spending leisurely time with the family
Spending leisurely time with my partner/friends
Experiencing beautiful countryside together with my partner
Good exercise and a way of getting from A to B
Something to keep the kids occupied
A fun challenge with the kids

grid.name: Q7b
grid.label: I am going to read out a number of statements. Could you please tell me which one or two best describe your attitude to cycling/biking, especially when away from home? If you select two statements, please could you tell me which one is the most important aspect for you personally.

close.label: Getting away into the great outdoors with friends
Great fun and a good workout
Fun and adventure with the kids

multiple.name: Q8
multiple.label: People have various things (whether emotional or physical) that they personally get out of cycling whilst on holiday or a short break. Could you please tell me your two main motivations for including cycling/mountain biking on your UK holidays or short break?

single.name: Q9
single.label: How often in the last 2 years have you been on a holiday/short break in the UK that included cycling/biking as a component or the main focus?

multiple.name: Q10
multiple.label: Thinking about cycling/mountain biking while on holiday or a short break, could you tell me all the places where you have undertaken such an activity?

close.label: The Highlands of Scotland & Isle of Skye
The Outer Islands - Shetland, Orkney & the Western Isles
Perthshire, Angus & Dundee and the Kingdom of Fife

single.name: Q11a
single.label: Who, if anyone, do you usually tend to cycle with when on holiday/ a short break in the UK?

single.name: Q11b
single.label: How many people would normally be in your group?

single.name: Q12
single.label: In the UK, would you normally take your own bike(s) or hire them at your destination?

single.name: Q13
single.label: Thinking about your most recent UK holiday/short break, did you decide to do some cycling/biking whilst planning your holiday, or was it a spontaneous decision when you were actually at your destination?

single.name: Q14
single.label: How important was it to you that there was the opportunity to include cycling/biking in that holiday/short break?

single.name: Q15
single.label: To what extend did the cycling/biking drive your choice of UK destination?

multiple.name: Q16
multiple.label: Which, if any, of the following other activities did you want your holiday destination to provide?

open.name: Q17
open.label: On a scale of 1 to 10 where 1 is the lowest and 10 is the highest how would you rate cycling/mountain biking (whichever is your preference) as an activity to do whilst on holiday/a short break in the UK?

intro.name: INTRODUCTION
intro.label: I'd now like to ask you some questions about your preferences and requirements whilst on a UK holiday/short break that incorporates cycling as an activity

multiple.name: Q18
multiple.label: What type of accommodation do you prefer?

multiple.name: Q19
multiple.label: What types of cycle routes/trails do you normally like on such holidays?

close.label: Off road on tracks and forest trails

multiple.name: Q20
multiple.label: What other service or equipment requirements would you have on such a holiday/break?

grid.name: Q21
grid.label: When choosing a destination in the UK for a holiday/short break which will include cycling, which components would you say are the main priorities for you? Please rank your top three priorities.

section.label: Cycling whilst on holiday in Scotland

intro.name: Q22a
intro.label: What was your experience of cycling/mountain biking, both positive and negative, whilst on holiday in Scotland?

intro.name: Q22b
intro.label: What would you expect the experience of cycling/mountain biking, both positive and negative, whilst on holiday in Scotland to be like?

grid.name: Q23a
grid.label: I am going to read out a number of facilities/services that could be available to those wanting to incorporate cycling/mountain biking into a holiday. Please could you tell me how you would rate Scotland's provision of each one, where: 1 = very poor 2 = poor 3 = average 4 = good 5 = very good If you have not been to Scotland on such a holiday/short break, please rate the facilities based on your perceptions/expectations.

multiple.name: Q24a
multiple.label: What kinds of cyclist do you think Scotland caters for best?

multiple.name: Q24b
multiple.label: And what kinds of cycling do you think Scotland caters for best?

grid.name: Q23b
grid.label: I'm going to read out the same list of facilities/services. Please could you tell me how you would rate provision of each one, where: 1 = very poor 2 = poor 3 = average 4 = good 5 = very good If you have not been to on such a holiday/short break, please rate the facilities based on your perceptions/expectations
